alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 9:01AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Paz County through 930 AM MST... At 901 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Salome, or 32 miles west of Tonopah, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central La Paz County. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 51 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
